code: import{RequestTool}from'../Tools/RequestTool';var GetAllItems=function GetAllItems(_userId){return RequestTool.GetRequest(RequestTool.API_URL+"/User/GetMarkets/"+_userId);};var GetUser=function GetUser(_id){return RequestTool.GetRequest(RequestTool.API_URL+"/User/Get/"+_id);};var GetAllCourses=function GetAllCourses(_userid){return RequestTool.GetRequest(RequestTool.API_URL+"/User/GetCourses/"+_userid);};var RemoveMarketItem=function RemoveMarketItem(_item){return RequestTool.DeleteRequest(RequestTool.API_URL+"/User/RemoveMarketItem",_item);};var RemoveCourse=function RemoveCourse(_item){return RequestTool.DeleteRequest(RequestTool.API_URL+"/User/RemoveCourse",_item);};export var UserService={GetAllItems:GetAllItems,GetUser:GetUser,GetAllCourses:GetAllCourses,RemoveMarketItem:RemoveMarketItem,RemoveCourse:RemoveCourse};
